text: It would be hella inapropriate for a real-life person to steal this idea, right?

text:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/americas/7743214.stm
Not the same, but interesting, I thought.

name: bazookaradio
text: Dude, steal it. As in go do it. That would be most excellent.

name: daidai
text: A comment left by daidai was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by treatyofparis, Ariamaki, Sweetlips)

text: evidence?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: the understanding that nobody cared should be proof enough.

name: brodenirwin17
text: I believe you.

name: wehavemagnums
text: I think this strip has to get a 5 based on concept alone.

name: unsentletter
text:
> I think this strip has to get a 5 based on concept alone.

Pretty much. It takes a cartoonist with utter confidence to go that far out on a concept limb. This shit is crazy . But it totally works.

Seriously, bravo.

name: clumpy
text: A comment left by clumpy was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by snowman, Deusoma, adonkon, ConnorMc)

name: kazad
text: I've always had the least trouble imagining what Little Nephew's voice sounds like

name: achilleselbow
text: I imagined Riley (younger brother) from The Boondocks.

name: vulpes-aurum
text: Good call.

name: epicurus
text: How do you make sure you're only doing 1 inch per hour? That seems like the hard part.

name: sargasm
text: How much cheese does it take to make one rude and raunchy, anyway?

name: 1000hz
text: You ain't need too much cheese sir no ain't need too much cheese at all.

name: blarghamagarky
text: Girls like a boy who eats cheese

name: tekende
text: I hope I find that out someday Ms. Blarghamagarky

name: i_love_kate
text:
And yet girls dislike an overweight boy with chronical flatulence and...

Wait, wait. Are you quoting here?

name: greenkoolayd
text: eating too much cheese can make one constipated.

name: apricotta
text:
I dunno... I mean, look at the French, they basically eat nothing but cheese.
You wouldn't question their rudeness and raunchiness, would you.

name: never_die
text: Cheese does cost hell of cash money. ESPECIALLY in the amount required for one to be rude and raunchy.

name: purplehaze
text: Little Nephew is really a lot like Ray, just without the cash to back up his ideas.

name: spinynorman
text:
About 70% of Achewood plotlines are based around some crazy-ass business idea.

Balls on phones, perfect jays, Jaime the Science Friend, Jared and Subway, Potty Pals, logos, programs for figuring out how much change is in the apartment, romance novels of all kinds, Perky Pervert, Mister Band to a certain extent, Stoned Lightning, Mexican Realism and Mr. Edison, The Dude and Catastrophe, Lazarus Loafer for sure, SaniTaco, and Leon Sumbitches, just to name a few.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Stoned Lightning? Business venture?

But dare I speak against Spiny Norman?

name: littlefatdog
text: LN once again proves he is the master of controlling people through the internet.

name: pwb
text: Little Nephew is such an underused character, but when he's there he's great

name: stuart
text: EXTREME UPDATE

name: jackparsons
text: Little Nephew never looks straight ahead.

name: stuart
text: Except in Panel 7.

name: jackparsons
text:
Barely. I was having trouble deciding. But the low social status insecure beta male in waiting thing is well done with his always-looking-up-diagonally eyes.

The rap insult arc is a great riff on Little Nephew's character and maturation needs.

name: rotavele
text: My first Achewood, and such a fine strip too.

name: heyoo
text: This is what Savetoby should've been, man.

name: gmm
text: The alt-text makes this a 5

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Roast Beef: More updates on current TV programs

-Philippe-
I fooled Franky's mom!
This is pretty bad. You might not want to read it.

Mr. Bear: A bit of a dark cloud above the old corpus

name: heccibiggs
text: I'm going to be honest here: Philippe's second blog entry nearly made me cry.

name: doc_rostov
text:
"noooooOOOOO!"

To be fair though, it was really sad. Combined with Cornelius feeling the pangs of his waning youth, that was probably one of the saddest complements of blog entries from this period. I wonder if Onstad was having a bad week. ):

P.S. You're only 5 days ahead of me! I'll catch up to you yet, Heccibiggs.

name: atlanticcity
text: "Oh No" :'(

name: i_love_kate
text: He warrrrrrned ye!

name: i_love_kate
text: Philippe kills a whole lot of shit that he loves.

name: charchar
text: Oh, you wacky internet.  All makin' grown-ups pretend to give a biscuit with two shits inside, you.

name: direhaggis
text: That webcam has to be hooked up to some sort of wireless feed with a generator to power a laptop or something. Ray must have had a hand in this business. I mean compared to Little Nephew photographing his bozack for the internets, Ray must have been relieved to hear about inching a Honda Civic into a lake for cash.

name: greenkoolayd
text: except for ray gets pissed...

name: rykan
text: I love how this is the 1337th strip I've seen.

name: dusty
text: The fact that he calls himself little nephew and even wears the initials for his relation to ray on his shirt kind of undermines his attempts to pretend he disregards or even doesn't idolize the guy.

name: soticoto
text: Starting one of the better arcs here. <3
